Description: Clear claim that answers the prompt and mentions both benefit and risk
Excellent: Very clear focused thesis that mentions both benefit and risk
Good: Mostly clear thesis but may miss a small detail
Fair: Thesis is vague or only mentions benefit or risk
Poor: No clear thesis or off topic

Description: Use of concrete examples to support ideas
Excellent: Uses specific detailed example for both benefit and risk
Good: Uses at least one clear example but some ideas stay general
Fair: Examples are weak or only partly connected to claim
Poor: No real examples or examples do not match ideas

Excellent: Ideas flow in a logical order with clear paragraphs
Good: Mostly logical order with minor jumps
Fair: Some parts feel out of order or confusing
Poor: No clear structure ideas jump around

Excellent: Explains why benefit and risk matter and connects them to education in depth
Good: Explains main ideas but some reasons are short or simple
Fair: Limited explanation often just lists points
Poor: Little or no explanation of why points matter

Excellent: Writing is clear with few noticeable errors
Good: Some minor errors but meaning stays clear
Fair: Frequent errors sometimes make meaning hard to follow

Description: Matches length and responds to all parts of the task
Excellent: Within suggested length and responds to all parts of the prompt
Good: Close to length and responds to most parts of the prompt
Fair: Too short or too long or misses an important part of the prompt
